sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react";
import { Image, Text, TextInput, TouchableOpacity, View } from "react-native"
import tw from "twrnc"

export default () => {
    const [isSelected, setSelection] = useState(false);
    
    return( 
    <View style = {tw`flex flex-row m-0 h-full w-full`}>
        <View style = {tw`h-full w-1/2 px-10 py-40`}>
            <View style = {tw`flex flex-col h-5/6 font-medium text-center rounded-lg`}>
                <Text style = {tw`text-3xl font-black`}>
                    WELCOME   BACK
                </Text>
                <Text style = {tw`text-gray-300 border-b border-gray-300 w-full`}>
                    Welcome back! Please enter your details. 
                </Text>
                <View style = {tw`px-0`}>    
                    <View style = {tw`py-5`}>
                        <Text style = {tw`text-lg text-left`}>
                            Email
                        </Text>
                        <TextInput placeholder="Enter your Email" style = {tw`border-2 text-xl h-10 rounded `}/>
                    </View>
                    <View style = {tw`py-5`}>
                        <Text style = {tw`text-lg text-left`}>
                            Password
                        </Text>
                        <TextInput placeholder="Enter your Password" style = {tw`border-2 text-xl h-10 rounded `}/>
                    </View>
                    <TouchableOpacity style = {tw`py-5 `}>
                        <Text style = {tw`font-bold text-right text-indigo-500 `}>
                            Forgotten password
                        </Text>
                    </TouchableOpacity>
                    <TouchableOpacity style = {tw`shadow-lg shadow-gray-500/50 border-2 border-orange-500 bg-orange-500 font-black h-10 rounded`}>
                        <Text style = { tw` text-gray-100 text-xl text-center font-bold`}>
                            SIGN IN
                        </Text>
                    </TouchableOpacity>
                </View>
            </View>
            <Text style = { tw`absolute bottom-2 left-0 text-gray-500`}>
                Â©_MasterCA
            </Text>    
        </View>
        <View style = {tw`h-full w-1/2 bg-gray-200 py-50`}>
            <Image source={ require('../../assets/logo.jpeg') }
            style = { {...tw`rounded-full self-center`,width : 300,height : 300} }
            />        
        </View>
    </View>
)}
